runDraw(String, String, FirebaseFirestore, Context) - Static method in class com.example.fusion1_events.DrawHelper
Runs the draw process for a given event.
Steps performed:
Fetch event data from Firestore.
Load attendees limit, waiting list, and invited list.
Determine available space.
If waiting list â‰¤ space available: move everyone.
Otherwise: randomly select a subset (lottery).
Update Firestore with the new invited and waiting lists.
Show appropriate Toast messages and log progress.
